title: Use Case: After casting a VOD
custom_preconds: Given a user is casting a VOD from At Bat or Web
custom_steps: When the VOD is done casting on the external display
custom_expected:
Then the user will see MLB.TV logo
and after a few seconds will transition to first Idle Screen

title: User Case: After casting a MLB.TV
custom_preconds: Given a user is casting a MLB.TV feed from At Bat or Web
custom_steps: When the MLB.TV feed is done casting on the external display
custom_expected:
Then the user will see MLB.TV logo
and after a few seconds will transition to the first Idle Screen

title: Use Case: Starting new content when Idle screen
custom_preconds: Given a user has an Idle Screen on a Chromecast
custom_steps: When a user attempts to cast new content
custom_expected: Then the content will begin to cast

title: Use Case: Idle Screen rotation
custom_preconds: Given a user is casting a VOD or MLB.TV feed from At Bat or Web
custom_steps: When the VOD is done casting on the external display
custom_expected:
Then the user will see MLB.TV logo
and after a few seconds will transition to first idle Screen
and after 30 seconds a new idle screen will appear

title: Use Case: Screen Order (Phase 1)
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps: When the user is idle
custom_expected:
Then the user will see rotating idle screens in the following order/duration:
1 Today's Games/Scores 30 seconds
2 News Story 1 30 seconds
3 News Story 2 30 seconds
4 Standings 30 seconds

title: Use Case: Disconnect from Cast
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
and the user has not casted media
custom_steps:
When a user sees the rotating idle screens (30 seconds each)
and the user has been idle for 5 minutes
custom_expected: Then the user will be disconnected from the Chromecast

title: Logos on Standings and Schedules
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and the user is on the Standings idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the correct logos for the teams

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/SFProduct/Team+Logos+For+Connected+Devices

title: Design
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps: When a user is on the Standings Idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a configurable background image
and MLB logo in the upper left
and the title of the screen (STANDINGS)
and informative text (Ready to cast from your phone and tablet or laptop)
and two tables (American League and National League)
and divisional titles (East, Central, West) separating the tables

title: Divisional Stadings
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps: When a user is on the Standings Idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see updated Standings
and correct AL East teams
and correct AL Central teams
and correct AL West teams
and correct NL East teams
and correct NL Central teams
and correct NL West teams

Compare to http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/

title: Wild Card Standings
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Standings Idle screen
and the user wants to see Wild Card Standings
custom_expected:
Then the user will see Wild Card Standings
with the current divisional leaders for both leagues
and the Wild Card standings
and informative text about Wild Card (The top two Wild Card teams from each league make the postseason and play each other in a one-game playoff.)

Compare against the web: http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/wildcard.jsp?ymd=20170627

title: Clinch Indicator
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Standings idle screen
and clinch data
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the correct clinch data prefixed to the team

w- (clinched wild card)
x- (clinched playoff berth)
y- (clinched division)
z- (clinched division and best record in the league)

Compared against web http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/wildcard.jsp?ymd=20170627

title: Wins
custom_preconds: Given the user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Standings idle screen
custom_expected: Then the user will see updated Wins (W) for each club

title: Loses
custom_preconds: Given the user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Standings idle screen
custom_expected: Then the user will see updated Loses (L) for each club

title: Win Percentage
custom_preconds: Given the user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Standings idle screen
custom_expected: Then the user will see updated Win Percentage (PCT) for each club

title: Games Behind/Back (GB)
custom_preconds: Given the user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Standings idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see updated Games Behind (GB) for each club
and the number will support one decimal point (6.0)
and the division leader(s) will have a dash (-)

title: Failsafe: API/Lookup Issue
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and the Standings API or lookup data is not running
custom_expected:
Then the user will not see the Standings page
and the other screens will rotate

title: Design
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When the user is idle
and is on the Schedule Idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a configurable background image
and see the MLB logo
and see the title of the screen (TODAY'S GAMES)
and see the instructional text (Ready to cast from your phone and tablet or laptop)
and see the game cells for each game

title: 15 games
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and 15 games on the MLB schedule
custom_expected:
Then the user will see 5 games across
and 3 games down

title: > 15 games
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and more than 15 games on the MLB schedule
custom_expected:
Then the user will see 5 games across
and 4 games down
and even spacing between game cells

title: 0 games
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and 0 games on the MLB schedule (HRD derby, offseason, two days after ASG)
custom_expected:
Then the user will not see the Schedule idle screen
and the other screens will rotate

title: Sort
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cells
custom_expected: Then the user will see the games sorted by start time

title: Preview
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cell for a game in preview
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the away team logo and record on the left
and the home team logo and record on the right
and separate by a @
and see the local time of the game

title: Live
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cell for a game in progress
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the away team logo and record on the left
and the home team logo and record on the right
and separate by a @
and see LIVE text in blue

title: Final
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cell for a game in final
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the away team logo and record on the left
and the home team logo and record on the right
and separate by a @
and see Final text in black

title: Postponed
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cell for a game in postponed state
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the away team logo and record on the left
and the home team logo and record on the right
and separate by a @
and see PPD text in blue

title: Start Time: TBD
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cell for a game with a TBD time (3:33am)
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the away team logo and record on the left
and the home team logo and record on the right
and separate by a @
and see TBD

title: Doubleheader - Back to Back
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cell for a back to back doubleheader

Game 1 w/ a Time (game id -1)
Game 2 w/ TBD (game id -2)
custom_expected:
Then the user will see two game cells
and the away team logo and record on the left
and the home team logo and record on the right
and separate by a @
and see local time for the first game
and see Game 2 for the second game

title: Doubleheader - Day/Night
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cell for a day/night doubleheader

Game 1 w/ a Time (game id -1)
Game 2 w/ a Time (game id -2)
custom_expected:
Then the user will see two game cells
and the away team logo and record on the left
and the home team logo and record on the right
and separate by a @
and see local time for the first game
and see local time for the second game
and sorted by time order

title: All Star Game
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the All Star Game
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the away team logo and record on the left
and the home team logo and record on the right

title: Non MLB Team
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and is on the Schedule idle screen
and views the game cell for a game w/ a non MLB team (Spring Training exhibition game involving college teams or minor league teams)
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the default logo

http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/team-logos/html5/65x65/default.png

title: Failsafe: API/Lookup Issue
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and the Schedule API or lookup data is not running
custom_expected:
Then the user will not see the Schedules page
and the other screens will rotate

title: Design
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps: When a user is on the News Idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a configurable background image
and MLB logo in the upper left
and the title of the screen (News)
and informative text (Ready to cast from your phone and tablet or laptop)
and see a News card with a thumbnail and title

title: News 1
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps: When a user is on the News Idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see News idle screen
and include most recent News video
and will include a thumbnail
and will include a title

title: News 2
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps:
When a user is on the News Idle screen
and after 30 seconds rotates
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a second News idle screen
and include next recent News video
and will include a thumbnail
and will include a title

title: Thumbnail
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps: When a user is on the News Idle screen
custom_expected: Then the user will see News video thumbnail

title: Title - 1 line
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps: When a user is on the News Idle screen
custom_expected: Then the user will see the title under the thumbnail

title: Title - 2 lines
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps:
When a user is on the News Idle screen
and the title is long
custom_expected: Then the user will see the title wrap to a second line

title: Use Case: Searching for Item
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
and is on the News idle screen
custom_steps: When the user searches for the title on the sender device (web or app)
custom_expected:
Then the search results should display the item
and the user is able to cast the item from the sender app

title: Failsafe: API/Lookup Issue
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and the News lookup is not running
custom_expected:
Then the user will not see the News page(s)
and the other screens will rotate

title: URL
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a cast
and is idle
custom_steps:
When the user views a idle screen
and then after 30 seconds
custom_expected:
Then the idle screen transitions from one to another, the background images will also update

http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-01.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-02.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-03.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-04.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-05.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-06.jpg

title: Configurable
custom_preconds: Given a new background image is received
custom_steps: When the image is uploaded to the server
custom_expected: Then the new image is verified on the idle screen

title: VOD
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps: When a user casts a VOD from a sender app (At Bat or web)
custom_expected: Then the VOD will cast

title: MLB.TV - Live
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps: When a user casts a live MLB.TV feed from a sender app (At Bat or web)
custom_expected: Then the live MLB.TV feed will cast

title: MLB.TV - Archive
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps: When a user casts a archive MLB.TV feed from a sender app (At Bat or web)
custom_expected: Then the archive MLB.TV feed will cast

title: Play
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is casting content from a sender app
and taps on the Play button
custom_expected:
Then content will play
and the progress bar will fade away

title: Pause
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is casting content from a sender app
and taps on the Play button
custom_expected:
Then content will pause
and the user will see the progress bar on the receiver app
and the progress bar will have information

title: Closed Captioning
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is casting content from a sender app
and taps on the CC button
custom_expected:
Then the closed captioning will appear on the screen
and the user can toggle them off and on
